name: survey-citation
title: SurveyCitation
description: A citation of a Survey in a bibliographic reference.

fields.name: surveyID
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a persistent, globally unique identifier.

fields.name: citationType
fields.description: The category that best matches the nature of a Citation.

fields.name: citationTypeIRI
fields.description: The IRI of the controlled vocabulary value for the type of Citation.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use an IRI for a term in a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: citationTypeVocabulary
fields.description: The reference to the controlled vocabulary where the definition of the value for citationType is given.

fields.name: bibliographicCitation
fields.description: A bibliographic reference for the resource.
fields.comments: From Dublin Core, 'Recommended practice is to include sufficient bibliographic detail to identify the resource as unambiguously as possible.' The intended usage of this term in Darwin Core is to provide the preferred way to cite the resource itself. Note that the intended usage of dcterms:references in Darwin Core, by contrast, is to point to the definitive source representation of the resource, if one is available.
fields.examples: `Museum of Vertebrate Zoology, UC Berkeley. MVZ Mammal Collection (Arctos). Record ID: http://arctos.database.museum/guid/MVZ:Mamm:165861?seid=101356. Source: http://ipt.vertnet.org:8080/ipt/resource.do?r=mvz_mammal.` (Occurrence example); `https://www.gbif.org/species/2439608 Source: GBIF Taxonomic Backbone` (Taxon example); `Rand, K.M., Logerwell, E.A. The first demersal trawl survey of benthic fish and invertebrates in the Beaufort Sea since the late 1970s. Polar Biol 34, 475–488 (2011). https://doi.org/10.1007/s00300-010-0900-2` (Event example)

fields.name: pageNumber

fields.name: referenceID
fields.description: An identifier for the reference in which a Citation occurs.

fields.name: referenceType
fields.description: The category that best matches the nature of a reference.

fields.name: referenceTypeIRI
fields.description: The IRI of the controlled vocabulary value for the type of reference.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use an IRI for a term in a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: referenceTypeVocabulary
fields.description: The reference to the controlled vocabulary where the definition of the value for referenceType is given.

fields.name: referenceYear
fields.description: The year the reference in a Citation was published.

fields.name: isPeerReviewed
fields.description: An indication of whether the reference for a Citation was peer reviewed.

fields.name: citationRemarks
fields.description: Comments or notes about a Citation.
